ingredients.item: 150g pack essential Waitrose Cooked King Prawns
1 Royal Gala apple, cored and diced
2 tbsp essential Waitrose Low Fat Vinaigrette Dressing

instructions.step: Cook the couscous in boiling water for 8 minutes until tender, drain and cool.
Stir in all the remaining ingredients and serve on 2 plates or in a large bowl.
